languages.text: {n}Мысли о Домин теснятся в голове, неуместные и даже вредные в этот священный момент. Не сразу я понимаю, как чужды они здесь и сейчас. Почему я думаю о {rt_mf|нем|ней}?{/n}

{n}Thoughts of Domin'{rt_name} crowd my mind, irrelevant and harmful though they are in this sacred moment. I do not immediately realise how foreign they are to the here and now. Why am I thinking about {rt_mf|him|her}?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мысли о Домин теснятся в голове, неуместные и даже вредные в этот священный момент. Не сразу я понимаю, как чужды они здесь и сейчас. Почему я думаю о {rt_mf|нем|ней}?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The thoughts of Enim crowd my mind, irrelevant and harmful in this sacred moment. I do not immediately realise how foreign they are to the here and now. Why am thinking about {mf|him|her}?{/n}
{n}The thoughts of Enim crowd my mind, irrelevant and harmful in this sacred moment. I do not immediately realise how foreign they are to the here and now. Why am thinking about {mf|him|her}?{/n}

{n}Thoughts of Domin'{rt_name} crowd my mind, irrelevant and harmful though they are in this sacred moment. I do not immediately realise how foreign they are to the here and now. Why am I thinking about {rt_mf|him|her}?{/n}

{n}Thoughts of Domin'{rt_name} crowd my mind, irrelevant and harmful though they are in this sacred moment. I do not immediately realise how foreign they are to the here and now. Why am I thinking about {rt_mf|him|her}?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Gedanken an Domin'{rt_name} umwölken meinen Geist, sind sie doch in diesem heiligen Augenblick unwichtig und sogar schädlich. Ich erkenne nicht sofort, wie fremdartig sie im Hier und Jetzt sind. Warum denke ich an {rt_mf|ihn|sie}?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thoughts of Domin'{rt_name} crowd my mind, irrelevant and harmful though they are in this sacred moment. I do not immediately realise how foreign they are to the here and now. Why am I thinking about {rt_mf|him|her}?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Gedanken an Domin'{rt_name} umwölken meinen Geist, sind sie doch in diesem heiligen Augenblick unwichtig und sogar schädlich. Ich erkenne nicht sofort, wie fremdartig sie im Hier und Jetzt sind. Warum denke ich an {rt_mf|ihn|sie} ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los pensamientos sobre Domin’{rt_name} llenan mi mente, por irrelevantes y nocivos que sean en este momento sacro. No comprendo de inmediato lo ajenos que son a este instante. ¿Por qué estoy pensando en {rt_mf|él|ella}?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thoughts of Domin'{rt_name} crowd my mind, irrelevant and harmful though they are in this sacred moment. I do not immediately realise how foreign they are to the here and now. Why am I thinking about {rt_mf|him|her}?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los pensamientos sobre Domin’{rt_name} llenan mi mente, por irrelevantes y nocivos que sean en este momento sacro. No comprendo de inmediato lo ajenos que son a este instante. ¿Por qué estoy pensando en {rt_mf|él|ella}?{/n}

languages.text: {n}この神聖な瞬間には不適切で危険だというのに、ドミン・{rt_name}のことが頭をよぎる。その思考が今この瞬間、いかに異質なものかすぐには気づけない。なぜ{rt_mf|彼|彼女}のことが頭に浮かぶのだろう…？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thoughts of Domin'{rt_name} crowd my mind, irrelevant and harmful though they are in this sacred moment. I do not immediately realise how foreign they are to the here and now. Why am I thinking about {rt_mf|him|her}?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この神聖な瞬間には不適切で危険だというのに、エニム・{name}のことが頭をよぎる。その思考が今この瞬間、いかに異質なものかすぐには気づけない。なぜ{mf|彼|彼女}のことが頭に浮かぶのだろう…？{/n}

languages.text: {n}关于秘者{rt_name}的想法充斥着我的脑海。在这神圣的时刻，这些念头是如此无关紧要，令人分心。而且，我并没有立刻意识到这种时候忽然想起{rt_mf|他|她}是多么突兀的念头。为什么我突然想起了{rt_mf|他|她}？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thoughts of Domin'{rt_name} crowd my mind, irrelevant and harmful though they are in this sacred moment. I do not immediately realise how foreign they are to the here and now. Why am I thinking about {rt_mf|him|her}?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}关于秘者{rt_name}的想法充斥着我的脑海。在这神圣的时刻，这些念头是如此无关紧要，令人分心。而且，我并没有立刻意识到这种时候忽然想起{rt_mf|他|她}是多么突兀的念头。为什么我突然想起了{rt_mf|他|她}？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Des pensées concernant {rt_mf|le|la} Domin'{rt_name} assaillent mon esprit, hors de propos et nuisibles en ce moment sacré. Je ne réalise pas immédiatement combien elles sont étrangères à ce qui se joue ici. Pourquoi est-ce que je pense à {rt_mf|lui|elle} ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thoughts of Domin'{rt_name} crowd my mind, irrelevant and harmful though they are in this sacred moment. I do not immediately realise how foreign they are to the here and now. Why am I thinking about {rt_mf|him|her}?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Des pensées concernant {rt_mf|le|la} Domin'{rt_name} assaillent mon esprit, hors de propos et nuisibles en ce moment sacré. Je ne réalise pas immédiatement combien elles sont étrangères à ce qui se joue ici. Pourquoi est-ce que je pense à {rt_mf|lui|elle} ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Domin'{rt_name} aklından ne geçirirse zihnime yansıyor. Bu kutsal süreçte alakasız ve zararlı olsalar da... Bu düşüncelerin şu an ne kadar yabancı olduğunun hemen farkına varmıyorum. Neden onu düşünüyorum?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Thoughts of Domin'{rt_name} crowd my mind, irrelevant and harmful though they are in this sacred moment. I do not immediately realise how foreign they are to the here and now. Why am I thinking about {rt_mf|him|her}?{/n}
